about.title: Meet Us
about.paragraph1: Discover {{name}}, the platform that connects travelers worldwide in search of authentic experiences with unique tourism services in Venezuela.
about.paragraph2: At {{name}}, we aim to give visibility to tourism services that deserve to be discovered, always seeking to create alliances that allow us to {{hashtag1}} and strengthen {{hashtag2}}.
about.paragraph3: Do you offer a tourism service and you'd like to showcase for free? Provide your details below, and together we'll drive the growth of your business, making it easier for more explorers to find you.
about.paragraph4: Join us and be part of this transformative adventure!

collaborate.title: #CollaborateToGrow
collaborate.description: Collaboration is key to success. We foster diversity of ideas and connections with our teams.

sustainability.title: #SustainabilityAndDevelopment
sustainability.description: We promote responsible practices that benefit our environment and communities.

trust.title: #WeBuildTrust
trust.description: We act with clarity and integrity, supporting local tourism with a strong commitment to transparency.

transformativeTourism.title: #TransformativeTourism
transformativeTourism.description: We believe in tourism as a transformative force for the development of our country and its communities.

purpose.title: Our Purpose and Aspiration

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We connect local effort and talent with explorers eager to discover Venezuelaâ€™s cultural and natural wealth. We promote sustainable tourism that benefits travelers and service providers, driving the development of local communities through efficient and responsible technology. With {{name}}, every booking is an opportunity to discover Venezuela.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We focus on creating authentic connections between visitors, hosts, and Venezuelaâ€™s natural wealth, offering lodging experiences that go beyond the traditional. Our goal is to revitalize tourism sustainably, driving community development through a responsible approach.

purpose.quote: We aim to promote tourism that benefits both travelers and the communities that welcome them.

join.title: Be Part of It
join.subtitle: Travel, Discover, Grow.
